summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility Solid Waste Utility and Water Department; amending Section 21.28.080 of the Seattle Municipal Code to adjust the method of calculating the wastewater volume charge; amending Sections 21.76.040 and 21.76.050 to adjust wastewater low income credits for single-family and duplex residences and to correct an omission; and amending Section 21.28.370 to increase the wastewater volume rate.
